feed.title: wweb.dev
feed.subtitle: Stay up to date with weekly updates, get resources for next project and read articles and tutorials about web development.

entry.title: Coding your own AI in 2023 with fastai
entry.summary: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.
entry.content: This is a guide, which focuses on the critical parts of the fastai course. I'll cover how to set up the ecosystem and how to create, train and deploy an AI model.

entry.title: Next.js Web App Template
entry.summary: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.
entry.content: A template to quickly set up a web app or SaaS. It includes the basic authentication logic using MongoDB as well as password reset logic with nodemailer.

entry.title: Next.js Micro-blogging Template
entry.summary: A Next.js template for a twitter-like blog. You can write in markdown and upload images and videos.
entry.content: A Next.js template for a twitter-like blog. You can write in markdown and upload images and videos.

entry.title: Next.js Blog Template
entry.summary: This is a simple blog template to quickly get started with writing. It has a clean design and provides a lot of flexibility.
entry.content: This is a simple blog template to quickly get started with writing. It has a clean design and provides a lot of flexibility.

entry.title: How to build a static website without frameworks using npm scripts
